Literally half the pages (14) are story or unflappable lol. I mean if you can get off to stuff like pages 2 or 20, good for you I guess. Even with questionable stuff like the makeout scene at the end, it’s still like 12 of 28 pages (the 29th is the TL page, obviously) have literally nothing to offer sexually. Either way, way too much time not spent on the actual content, the other girls definitely needed some time and backstory too. Just an overall missed opportunity of a doujin IMO, shame too, has solid art and great expressions.
